Name: Cosmic Monsters 2 Enclaves Dawn
About the game: Accompany Francis on his queer journey through the Orasis region and fight with him the enclave that tries to oppress the region. - Fight or capture wild Cosmic Monsters - Prove yourself in the 9 arenas of the Orasis region - Explore the Orasis region - Train yourself to be a real OSA agent and make your boss proud! - Prove yourself in the regional league of the Orasis region. - Tame your Cosmic Monsters and fight with it. - Equip your Cosmic Monsters with items to make them stronger. - Find all 239 Cosmic Monsters in the Orasis and KraiGa Region! - Help rebuild the City of Ã–hringen with collect ingedients such as 'tar or stone blocks' - benefit from the new catch mechanic This game does not support microtransactions!
